questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Model of a vessel

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A display of a model ship
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A landscape
C) A model ship
D) A painting

A) A tree
B) A person
C) A model of a ship
D) A building

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Water
C) A plain wall
D) Other ships

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) Sand
C) A pedestal holding the model ship
D) A street

A) R/V Seafarer
B) R/V Coral Reef II
C) R/V Ocean Explorer
D) R/V Marine Voyager

What color is the model ship primarily?
A) Green
B) Red
C) Blue, red and white
D) Black

A) A small boat
B) A helicopter pad
C) A swimming pool
D) A garden

A) A model of a building
B) A model of a ship
C) A model of a car
D) A model of an airplane

A) Blue white and Red  
B) Green
